name: suksma - barium titanate --- Isosceles edit03
milkdrop_raw:

b2x=1.000
b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250

wavecode_0_sep=0

wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=1.000
wave_1_per_frame1=advance=advance+ 0.005;
wave_1_per_frame2=advance=if( above(advance,2) , 0, advance);
wave_1_per_frame3=t1=advance
wave_1_per_point1=s=sample*6.28;
wave_1_per_point2=
wave_1_per_point3=//plot random x position via function of sample pos;
wave_1_per_point4=xp=sin(s)+sin(s*0.34)+sin(s*24.3)+sin(s*13.8);
wave_1_per_point5=xp=xp*0.20;
wave_1_per_point6=
wave_1_per_point7=//plot random y position via function of sample pos;
wave_1_per_point8=yp=cos(s)+sin(s*0.24)+cos(s*17.4)+sin(s*37.7);
wave_1_per_point9=yp=yp*0.20;
wave_1_per_point10=
wave_1_per_point11=//plot random z position via function of sample pos;
wave_1_per_point12=zp=cos(s)+cos(s*5.24)+cos(s*47.4)+cos(s*27.7);
wave_1_per_point13=zp=zp*0.25;
wave_1_per_point14=
wave_1_per_point15=//pull stars toward screen
wave_1_per_point16=zp=zp + 1 - t1;
wave_1_per_point17=
wave_1_per_point18=//correct when below 0
wave_1_per_point19=zp=if( below(zp,0) , zp+2 , zp );
wave_1_per_point20=
wave_1_per_point21=//darken far stars
wave_1_per_point22=a=(1 - zp*0.5);
wave_1_per_point23=
wave_1_per_point24=yq=zp;
wave_1_per_point25=zq=yp;
wave_1_per_point26=yp=yq;
wave_1_per_point27=zp=zq;
wave_1_per_point28=
wave_1_per_point29=zp=zp;
wave_1_per_point30=
wave_1_per_point31=zp=zp+1.1;
wave_1_per_point32=
wave_1_per_point33=x_screen=xp/zp + 0.5;
wave_1_per_point34=y_screen=yp/zp ;
wave_1_per_point35=
wave_1_per_point36=x=x_screen;
wave_1_per_point37=y=y_screen;
wave_1_per_point38=
wave_1_per_point39=r=1;
wave_1_per_point40=g=1;
wave_1_per_point41=b=1;
wave_1_per_point42=
wave_1_per_point43=
wave_1_per_point44=
wave_1_per_point45=n2=abs((sample*1.283)-3.1415);
wave_1_per_point46=
wave_1_per_point47=tm =time / 7;
wave_1_per_point48=r=sin(n2+tm)*0.5+0.5;
wave_1_per_point49=g=sin(n2+2.1+tm)*0.5+0.5;
wave_1_per_point50=b=sin(n2+4.2+tm)*0.5+0.5;
wavecode_2_enabled=0
wavecode_2_samples=512
wavecode_2_sep=0
wavecode_2_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_2_bUseDots=0

wavecode_2_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_2_r=1.000
wavecode_2_g=1.000
wavecode_2_b=1.000
wavecode_2_a=1.000
wavecode_3_enabled=0
wavecode_3_samples=512
wavecode_3_sep=0
wavecode_3_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_3_bUseDots=0

wavecode_3_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_3_r=1.000
wavecode_3_g=1.000
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=0.470
wave_3_per_point1=xs=sin(sample*6.28);
wave_3_per_point2=ys=cos(sample*6.28);
wave_3_per_point3=xs=xs*0.7 + 0.5;
wave_3_per_point4=ys=ys*0.7 + 0.5;
wave_3_per_point5=xs=min(xs,0.958);
wave_3_per_point6=xs=max(xs,0.042);
wave_3_per_point7=ys=min(ys,0.988);
wave_3_per_point8=ys=max(ys,0.012);
wave_3_per_point9=x=xs;y=ys;
wave_3_per_point10=
wave_3_per_point11=n2=abs((sample*6.283)-3.1415);
wave_3_per_point12=
wave_3_per_point13=r=sin(n2+time)*0.5+0.5;
wave_3_per_point14=g=sin(n2+2.1+time)*0.5+0.5;
wave_3_per_point15=b=sin(n2+4.2+time)*0.5+0.5;
wave_3_per_point16=
wave_3_per_point17=a = above( y , 0.98 )
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=7
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=0
shapecode_0_textured=1
shapecode_0_num_inst=1
shapecode_0_x=0.500
shapecode_0_y=0.500
shapecode_0_rad=0.51645
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_0_r=1.000
shapecode_0_g=1.000
shapecode_0_b=1.000
shapecode_0_a=1.000
shapecode_0_r2=1.000
shapecode_0_g2=1.000
shapecode_0_b2=1.000
shapecode_0_a2=0.000
shapecode_0_border_r=1.000
shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000

shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=1
shapecode_1_num_inst=1

shapecode_1_y=0.740
shapecode_1_rad=0.61775
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000

shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=1.000

shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=y = sin(q2/17)*0.4 + 0.5;
shape_1_per_frame2=
shape_1_per_frame3=//ang = q2/9
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=7
shapecode_2_additive=1

shapecode_2_textured=1

shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=x= sin(q2/8)*0.1 + 0.5;
shape_2_per_frame2=y= cos(q2/8)*0.1*1.333 + 0.5;
shape_2_per_frame3=
shape_2_per_frame4=y = y + sin(q2/4)*0.4;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=zoom = 1.001;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_cells;
warp_2=` 
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float1 d = 0.01;
warp_7=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y*1280*texsize.z;
warp_8=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y*1024*texsize.w;
warp_9=`    float2 my_uv = uv + float2(dx,dy)*0.005;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`
warp_12=`
warp_13=`//    float1 v = 0.01;
warp_14=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv).y;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`//ret = 0;
warp_18=`//   ret = tex2D( sampler_cells, uv)/ lerp(ret,tex2D(sampler_main,uv_orig-my_uv+uv),0.3);
warp_19=`      // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_20=`      // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time.
warp_21=`      ret.xyz += (ret - GetBlur3(uv-floor(uv)*0))*0.3 - 0.05;
warp_22=`      ret.xyz *= 1;
warp_23=`
warp_24=`      // add noise:
warp_25=`      float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.25 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_26=`      ret.xyz += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)*0.1;
warp_27=`
warp_28=`      // desaturate over time, to keep the globs white
warp_29=`      ret.xyz = lerp(ret.xyz, lum(ret.xyz), 0.2);
warp_30=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`
comp_5=`float2 uv2 = uv*0.25;
comp_6=`float3 col = 0;
comp_7=`float2 uv3 = uv2;
comp_8=`for(int i = 0; i<16; i++){
comp_9=`    uv3 += i*float2(0.25,0) - (0==(i)%4)*float2(0,0.25);
comp_10=`    col = lerp(col,i/16.0,saturate(-GetPixel(uv3).y+tex2d(sampler_pw_main,frac(uv3)).y));
comp_11=`
comp_12=`}
comp_13=`ret = lerp(GetPixel(uv).z*float3(0.6,0.2,1),float3(1,1,1),col*saturate(1-GetBlur1(uv).x*2));
comp_14=`    float gx = GetPixel(uv+float2(1,0)*texsize.zw) - GetPixel(uv-float2(1,0)*texsize.zw);
comp_15=`    float gy = GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1)*texsize.zw) - GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1)*texsize.zw);
comp_16=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx, gy, .04));
comp_17=`
comp_18=`    ret = lerp(ret,float3(1.1,0.8,0.5),(dot(g.xyz,float3(uv-0.5,0.6))*0.5+0.5)*GetPixel(uv).x);
comp_19=`
comp_20=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_21=`}
comp_22=`
